article_title: Hostage families tell Netanyahu to 'stop hiding and take responsibility'
sentence: Israel  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  spokesman  Daniel  Hagari  earlier  said  an  initial  assessment  had  found  that  the  six  hostages  were  "brutally  murdered  by  Hamas  terrorists  shortly  before  we  reached  them"    T-E-X-T-E-N-D.
